## ICollapsibleToolboxItem interface

Interface for an item in the toolbox that can be collapsed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICollapsibleToolboxItem extends ISelectableToolboxItem 
```
**Extends:** [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getChildToolboxItems()](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem.getchildtoolboxitems.md) | Gets any children toolbox items. (ex. Gets the subcategories) |
|  [isExpanded()](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem.isexpanded.md) | Whether the toolbox item is expanded to show its child subcategories. |
|  [toggleExpanded()](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem.toggleexpanded.md) | Toggles whether or not the toolbox item is expanded. |
